thread.title: This Brief Video Explains Common Misconceptions About Evolution
thread.title_full: This Brief Video Explains Common Misconceptions About Evolution

author: Hemant Mehta
title: This Brief Video Explains Common Misconceptions About Evolution
text:
February 9, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
In an excellent new video for SciShow, Hank Green goes over some common falsehoods about evolution. I know you’re not fooled by any of them, but you may want to pass this video along to all your relatives on Facebook who are. 
I can’t believe people still don’t get how scientists use the word “theory.” how many times do we have to explain that one? 
(Thanks to Liz for the link)
